dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 218 IH: CHAMPVA Children’s Protection Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Brown of Florida (for herself and Mr. Walz) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the maximum age for children eligible for medical care under the CHAMPVA program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the CHAMPVA Children’s Protection Act of 2015.

section.header: Increase of maximum age for children eligible for medical care under CHAMPVA program

subsection.text: Section 1781(c) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking twenty-three and inserting twenty-six; and
by striking twenty-third birthday and inserting twenty-sixth birthday.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to medical care provided on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
